## ITrackResult.isLeftHandProb property

The probability that the detected hand (if any) is a left hand. Note that this is with respect to the processed video which may or may not be flipped depending on how you retrieved it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isLeftHandProb: number;
```
